IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING COVID-19 AND THE SITUATION IN FRANCE

Due to events related to Covid-19 and following the announcement of the Federal Council on Monday March 16, we inform you that our hotel will be closed from Friday, March 20 to Thursday April 30, 2020.
Due to COVID-19 and upon request of the Quebec Government, our offices are closed, but the online store stays open.
During this Covid-19 crisis, our site remains open.
